TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBarPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel

remarks.format: ## Remarks A ToolBarPanel determines which <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> items will fit inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> and which must be put in the overflow area. The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.OverflowMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property determines how items should be distributed between the ToolBarPanel and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarOverflowPanel>.
